review_comment: the original 500ml bottle is big high quality plastic and has blue colour liquid in it as mentioned in the contents of the bottle whereas the duplicate bottle is small for the same 500ml bad quality plastic and the liquid in it is transparent water colour and no blue colourant even though it is mentioned in its ingredients on the label seller is cheating customers by selling mostly fake products these days all our money into the drain by the way the original was purchased directly from 3m car care store

product_name: 3M Car Care Glass Cleaner, 500ml
review_title: just a mix of soapy water leaves smudges on the glass
review_comment: i ignored most reviews talking about this being duplicate product and bought anyways although it had a holographic sticker on nozzle but i still feel the one sold here is duplicate 3m product the mix appears to be soapy water with some sort of alcohol substance it leaves smudges which defeats the purpose of window cleaner i used it once right after washing my car and definitely not impressed with the outcome not recommended

product_name: 3M Car Care Glass Cleaner, 500ml
review_comment: this is a fake product the top sprayer is broken and was taped so that it doesn t leak there is no manufacturing date batch no expiry or mrp writen on it looks like a soap water inside so pls be careful

review_comment: hi after long time survey i ended up with this proklear wwc windshield wash and believe me it was great using this product till date i was using 15 maruti suzuki windshield wash pouch or waxpol windshield wash but this time switched to proklear and it is a great product though found it to be costly as compared to others but you get quality stuff and has to use a capful only no streakes left no glares at all on the windshield shared 10ml each with my friends as well all are happy that refreshing smell aahhhhh product delivery was good and fast properly wrapped in a bubble wrap no leaks either thumps up

product_name: PROKLEAR ¬Æ WWC Windshield Wash Additive Concentrate 500ml -Just Add 5ml Per Fill, Keeps Windshield Clear and Wipers Lubricated 100 Refills, Anti Wiper Judder Formula
review_comment: this is one of the best products to be used it leaves very very less white residue on windshield as compare to a shampoo or ezee that we put in washer the wipers will stop judder with regular use and it cleans the windshield in mo time alwaysuse it with filter water instead of tap water and the spray nozzles will not clogg

product_name: PROKLEAR ¬Æ WWC Windshield Wash Additive Concentrate 500ml -Just Add 5ml Per Fill, Keeps Windshield Clear and Wipers Lubricated 100 Refills, Anti Wiper Judder Formula
review_comment: i m writing this review after a month of use of this product i only use my company s own windshield wiper fluid at least i did for the last 2 years since i bought my car but circumstances led me to be forced to buy this wiper fluid and trust me i aren t disappointed it leaves no scratches even i have to wash my windshield after driving through some seriously dusty roads most of all this thing leaves no water on my windshield seriously my car would be covered everywhere with mist dew in the morning save my windshield because of this wiper fluid driving when it rains too feels better somehow

product_name: PROKLEAR ¬Æ WWC Windshield Wash Additive Concentrate 500ml -Just Add 5ml Per Fill, Keeps Windshield Clear and Wipers Lubricated 100 Refills, Anti Wiper Judder Formula
review_comment: is is a good product and does it job pretty well recommended for long trip drivers and it is much cheaper than the authorised service centre plastic pouches which sell for 20 or 25 rupees you can keep the bottle in your car and use it whenever required or prepare the solution in some water bottles and keep them handy for use in case of emergency of long highway trips

review_comment: it works exactly as they claim ihave used different brands in the last 4 years but this one really does the magic the windshield becomes cleans without streaks and scratches very small quantity required highly recommended

review_title: glass cleaning is fine doesnt lubricate wiper blades they start juddering

product_name: PROKLEAR ¬Æ WWC Windshield Wash Additive Concentrate 500ml -Just Add 5ml Per Fill, Keeps Windshield Clear and Wipers Lubricated 100 Refills, Anti Wiper Judder Formula
review_title: great product must have for every car user who cares

product_name: Sonax 371141 Clear View 1:100 Windscreen Washer | Eradicates Dazzling And Greasy Films | Removes Tough Stains & Dirt - 250ml
review_title: crystal clear glass and super silent wipers
review_comment: been using this for the past 7 years keeps the wipers soft and the windscreen clear removes bird poop or even the most stubborn stains from the windscreen in a few wiper swipes it has shown better results than the 3m equivalent lacks water repellant properties so i usually add a recommended amount of rain x to the washer mixture the results are phenomenal if you like your windscreens crystal clear use this it s german

product_name: Sonax 371141 Clear View 1:100 Windscreen Washer | Eradicates Dazzling And Greasy Films | Removes Tough Stains & Dirt - 250ml
review_comment: this is an initial review about the condition in which the product was delivered the contents were sticking on the outside of the bottle as a thick gel and have spilled on the invoice in the same carton i find returning a cumbersome process and use it only if the product is not usable so will not be exercising that option the quantity also doesn t seem to be full any liquid is filled up to the top of the container whereas this one seems to be well below the normal level to which a fluid is filled in any bottle based on assumption no measurement done check the images the car windshield water container has only recently been topped up so it will not be a until a few months that the actual product review will be available

review_title: does what it says it does
review_comment: works well cleans the windshield but i think mice love it s flavour as they devoured the tubing to the windshield washer the very next day i used this in the water tank of my car now i have a good detergent but no pipe to carry it to the nozzle

product_name: Sonax 371141 Clear View 1:100 Windscreen Washer | Eradicates Dazzling And Greasy Films | Removes Tough Stains & Dirt - 250ml
review_title: cleans the windscreens with minimal wiper usage
review_comment: have used a couple of other windshield cleaner products before most of them were ok or did a good job but if you have a rear windscreen washer then some of the products do leave a residue on the paint that does wash off but i wanted to try something new i have used couple of other products from sonax and they were good this windshield cleaner from sonax did a good job infact i can say it was better than other products just one spray and a single wiper swipe and the glass is clean also i have not noticed any residue on the rear panel or bumper post using it besides the dust non streakcan t comment on the fragrance however

product_name: Sonax 371141 Clear View 1:100 Windscreen Washer | Eradicates Dazzling And Greasy Films | Removes Tough Stains & Dirt - 250ml
review_title: don t buy if you are looking for antiglare
review_comment: in clear weather it seems to clean perfectly but during rain it is not able to clear wax films microlayers of car wash deposits and due to that light of the oncoming traffic scatters it was unable to lift old deposits from windscreen i am writing this review after close observation and sufficient use

product_name: Sonax 371141 Clear View 1:100 Windscreen Washer | Eradicates Dazzling And Greasy Films | Removes Tough Stains & Dirt - 250ml

product_name: PROKLEAR WWC-AR Anti Rain-Rain Repellent Windshield Wash Additive Concentrate 250ml - 5ml per Fill - Keeps Windshield Clear & Wipers Lubricated 50 Refills - Anti Wiper Judder Formula (250ml)
review_comment: well the usage is straight forward pour the recommended dilution ratio in the wiper wash and use it it gives a nice rain repellent coating on the glass water beading is good and seldomly you have to use the wiper however the problem starts at night all the beads reflect light so one would use the wiper at higher speeds right no that causes one more issue interesting every wiper there is a very thin foggy layer of the active ingredient that is meant to cause the repellent effect now this layer normally does not cause an issue as it dries off in a second but at high wiper speed that 1 second dry time is not enough as before it dries the wiper comes back for the next wipe and the foggy layer remains constantly it hampers driving like crazy at night day time it s absolutely fine summer and winter it s absolutely fine but rainy season night drives are horrible that s why only 1 star

product_name: PROKLEAR WWC-AR Anti Rain-Rain Repellent Windshield Wash Additive Concentrate 250ml - 5ml per Fill - Keeps Windshield Clear & Wipers Lubricated 50 Refills - Anti Wiper Judder Formula (250ml)
review_comment: after struggling to find a windscreen washer concentrate i stumbled upon proklear wwc ar anti rain on amazon india there were some reviews about streaking staining of hands etc but did not have any issue obviously one needs to be careful about staining ones hands or clothes and if that were to be a concern i would suggest wearing gloves or an apron i believe that if you use the recommended ratio of the concentrate you will not have any issues i used two caps of the concentrate in a mahindra thar for a full refill of the washer reservoir it is cheap and stating that i am extremely satisfied would be an understatement i would not hesitate in recommending this to anyone

product_name: PROKLEAR WWC-AR Anti Rain-Rain Repellent Windshield Wash Additive Concentrate 250ml - 5ml per Fill - Keeps Windshield Clear & Wipers Lubricated 50 Refills - Anti Wiper Judder Formula (250ml)
review_comment: it cleans well and very easy to use no measuring bottle so will have to use cap or approx it is very little effective during rain and for 5 mins no anti glare or night time high beam issue good for cleaning only

product_name: ShineXPro 200mL Windshield Washer Fluid For Car - Car Windshield Cleaner Liquid In Concentrate Form (20mL Enough For 1L Tank) - Get A Streak Free Finish With Our Car Wiper Liquid
review_comment: i live in an area where it s very dusty and also it rains 6 months in a year so having a proper windshield cleaner while driving is a must i previously used to get a 1 ltr solution from tata showroom itself for my harrier but was not happy with it as it used to leave behind a lot of residue on the windshield i have started using shinexpro windshield concentrate from last 8 months and i am very happy with it positive 1 its a concentrate so the bottle is very small 200ml and you can just carry it in your car for someone like me who travels from state to state for my work and do a lot of night driving this is super important 2 only 20ml needed to make 1 ltr solution so this small bottle will last a long time at least 5 10 uses for a normal sized car negative 1 you should only add 20 ml for 1 ltr of distilled water if you add more than 20ml it will leave some stains on your glass so for me to measure that exactly 20 ml is difficult and it will be best if the brand can send a measuring cup 2 delivery took 4 days so very slow3 also it works only with distilled water so have to use aquaguard water everytime

product_name: ShineXPro 200mL Windshield Washer Fluid For Car - Car Windshield Cleaner Liquid In Concentrate Form (20mL Enough For 1L Tank) - Get A Streak Free Finish With Our Car Wiper Liquid
review_comment: well concentrated use lesser amount the suggested on the bottle cleans well but can leave residue on drying if extra quantity is used for best results put 15ml maximum at a time very satisfied with it overall

product_name: ShineXPro 200mL Windshield Washer Fluid For Car - Car Windshield Cleaner Liquid In Concentrate Form (20mL Enough For 1L Tank) - Get A Streak Free Finish With Our Car Wiper Liquid

product_name: ShineXPro 200mL Windshield Washer Fluid For Car - Car Windshield Cleaner Liquid In Concentrate Form (20mL Enough For 1L Tank) - Get A Streak Free Finish With Our Car Wiper Liquid
review_title: best product for your car windshield

product_name: PROKLEAR Wash Additive Concentrate - Keeps Windshield Clear and Wipers Lubricated 50 Refills (250ml)
review_comment: i was using water for windshield wiper wash until i realised that water was not enough especially when you have bird droppings or squashed bugs on our windshield then after reading lots of reviews on amazon and in team bhp i decided to go with this one as i was happy with their dry car wash concentrate initially i had white marks after drying then i realised i was using more concentrate use 5ml for 1ltr and there are no white marks on the screen and cleaning as efficient there is no mention on the bottle regarding how much to add so i had to find it the hard way but the effectiveness of the solution and quick drying effect along with the value of the money it is not wrong to give it a 5 star rating

product_name: PROKLEAR Wash Additive Concentrate - Keeps Windshield Clear and Wipers Lubricated 50 Refills (250ml)
review_comment: bought this product as i had seen some good reviews and even thought about the value of money on this product but it turns out that this product does not deliver on it s claims i d like to mention that my wipers are fairly new as they were recently replaced and i did use the recommended 2 5ml concentrate mix and all it does is leave white streaks across my windshield and worsens when it dries would not recommend this product even if it appears to be value for money

product_name: PROKLEAR Wash Additive Concentrate - Keeps Windshield Clear and Wipers Lubricated 50 Refills (250ml)
review_comment: completely useless bought formula one before this which was okay 4 stars imo so i thought i d try this out for a change this is utter garbage have tried in different vehicles with different concentrations still no result comes from someone with extensive experience exact wash fluid tank capacity guidelines for variation in concentration for sub zero temperatures bug splatter removal with just wiper fluid on highway runs this just doesn t work

product_name: PROKLEAR WWC-AR Anti Rain-Rain Repellent Windshield Wash Additive Concentrate 250ml - 5ml per Fill - Keeps Windshield Clear & Wipers Lubricated 50 Refills - Anti Wiper Judder Formula (250ml)
review_comment: well the usage is straight forward pour the recommended dilution ratio in the wiper wash and use it it gives a nice rain repellent coating on the glass water beading is good and seldomly you have to use the wiper however the problem starts at night all the beads reflect light so one would use the wiper at higher speeds right no that causes one more issue interesting every wiper there is a very thin foggy layer of the active ingredient that is meant to cause the repellent effect now this layer normally does not cause an issue as it dries off in a second but at high wiper speed that 1 second dry time is not enough as before it dries the wiper comes back for the next wipe and the foggy layer remains constantly it hampers driving like crazy at night day time it s absolutely fine summer and winter it s absolutely fine but rainy season night drives are horrible that s why only 1 star

product_name: PROKLEAR WWC-AR Anti Rain-Rain Repellent Windshield Wash Additive Concentrate 250ml - 5ml per Fill - Keeps Windshield Clear & Wipers Lubricated 50 Refills - Anti Wiper Judder Formula (250ml)
review_comment: after struggling to find a windscreen washer concentrate i stumbled upon proklear wwc ar anti rain on amazon india there were some reviews about streaking staining of hands etc but did not have any issue obviously one needs to be careful about staining ones hands or clothes and if that were to be a concern i would suggest wearing gloves or an apron i believe that if you use the recommended ratio of the concentrate you will not have any issues i used two caps of the concentrate in a mahindra thar for a full refill of the washer reservoir it is cheap and stating that i am extremely satisfied would be an understatement i would not hesitate in recommending this to anyone
